cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on December 10, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3988, Mental Health in International Development and Humanitarian Settings Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 106 (Thursday, June 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DEUTCH:
H.R. 3988.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 and Article I, Section 8,
Clause 18 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H2929]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: MINDS Act
